attributes.action: ban all headgear which obscures a persons face
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: having seen the images on last evenings news where an owner was assaulted by youths covered by hoods I think we can address all questions of identity by banning all forms of headgear which obscures a persons face.  That means cloths with hoods and headgear worn by religious sects in public places.
